# ================== EVOLVE-BLOCK-START ==================
import torch
import torch.nn as nn

class ModelNew(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self, in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size, scaling_factor):
        super(ModelNew, self).__init__()
        self.conv = nn.Conv2d(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size)
        self.bn = nn.BatchNorm2d(out_channels)
        # Absorb the scaling factor into the batch normalization parameters
        with torch.no_grad():
            self.bn.weight *= scaling_factor
            self.bn.bias *= scaling_factor

    def forward(self, x):
        x = self.conv(x)
        x = self.bn(x)
        return x

batch_size = 128
in_channels = 3
out_channels = 16
height, width = 32, 32
kernel_size = 3
scaling_factor = 2.0

def get_inputs():
    return [torch.randn(batch_size, in_channels, height, width)]

def get_init_inputs():
    return [in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size, scaling_factor]
# =================== EVOLVE-BLOCK-END ===================
